005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.datatype.AbstractDatatypeManager;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml.impl.IDatatypeProvider;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml.impl.XmlCoreDatatypeProvider;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml.impl.XmlMarkupLineDatatypeProvider;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml.impl.XmlMarkupMultilineDatatypeProvider;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml.impl.XmlProseCompositDatatypeProvider;
015
016import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
017
018import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Set;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022
023import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
027
028/**
029 * Support for managing Module data type implementations aligned with the XML
030 * schema format for use in schema generation.
031 */
032public class XmlDatatypeManager
033    extends AbstractDatatypeManager {
034  public static final String NS_XML_SCHEMA = "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema";
035
036  @NonNull
037  private static final Lazy<List<IDatatypeProvider>> DATATYPE_PROVIDERS = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> List.of(
038      new XmlCoreDatatypeProvider(),
039      new XmlProseCompositDatatypeProvider(
040          ObjectUtils.notNull(List.of(
041              new XmlMarkupMultilineDatatypeProvider(),
042              new XmlMarkupLineDatatypeProvider()))))));
043
044  public void generateDatatypes(@NonNull XMLStreamWriter2 writer) throws XMLStreamException {
045    // resolve dependencies
046    Set<String> used = getUsedTypes();
047
048    Set<String> requiredTypes = getDatatypeTranslationMap().values().stream()
049        .filter(used::contains)
050        .collect(Collectors.toCollection(LinkedHashSet::new));
051
052    for (IDatatypeProvider provider : DATATYPE_PROVIDERS.get()) {
053      Set<String> providedDatatypes = provider.generateDatatypes(requiredTypes, writer);
054      requiredTypes.removeAll(providedDatatypes);
055    }
056
057    if (!requiredTypes.isEmpty()) {
058      throw new IllegalStateException(
059          String.format("The following datatypes were not provided: %s",
060              requiredTypes.stream().collect(Collectors.joining(","))));
061    }
062  }
063}
